title: Rework for Le Blanc?
body:
Hi, since Riot hates assassins, can we get a rework for LB?

Removing her silence was unnecessary at her 46% win rate and now DFG also nerfed.

Riot, you removed her safety, her burst and no compensation buffs. So, I wonder, why don't we get a rework for this champ?

replies.body:
Because she is one of the few "old" champion to really fit her theme really good. She is  a deceiver, and her kit is perfect for her role.
Also, the removal of the silence **was necessary**, since it offered absolutely no counterplay to her burst. She is still strong, she just needs a bit more skill now.

sub par =/= need skill to play.

LB was just fine with the silence. No one complains now cause you can't see her anymore.
